Package observerfiles

Interface Observable<M,​T>

Type Parameters:
M - The type of the observable to be observed.
T - The message type for updates to observers.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExampleModel, ObservableSupport
public interface Observable<M,​T>
Author:
Pelle Evensen, evensen@chalmers.se

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addObserver​(Observer<M,​T> observer)
    Adds an observer to this observable.
    boolean removeObserver​(Observer<M,​T> observer)
    Removes an observer from this observable.

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      boolean addObserver​(Observer<M,​T> observer)
      Adds an observer to this observable. The observers are a Set -- i.e. adding two (or more) equal observers will only register the first one.
      Parameters:
      observer - An observer that observes observables of type M with message type T.
      Returns:
      true if the observer was not already in the Set of observers.

    • removeObserver

      boolean removeObserver​(Observer<M,​T> observer)
      Removes an observer from this observable. Removal of an observer not in the Set of observers has no effect except on the value returned.
      Parameters:
      observer - An observer that observes observables of type M with message type T.
      Returns:
      true if the observer was already in the Set of observers.
